name: morpheus-lsp
description: Language Server Protocol implementation for MOHAA Morpheus Script

scripts.build: esbuild src/server.ts --bundle --outfile=dist/server.js --format=cjs --platform=node && cp -r src/data dist/ && cp ../tree-sitter-morpheus/tree-sitter-morpheus.wasm dist/ && cp node_modules/web-tree-sitter/tree-sitter.wasm dist/
scripts.build:tsc: tsc && cp -r src/data dist/ && cp ../tree-sitter-morpheus/tree-sitter-morpheus.wasm dist/ && cp node_modules/web-tree-sitter/tree-sitter.wasm dist/
